amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit taxpayer dollars from funding the International Organization for Migration's "Refugee Travel Loan Program.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gooden (TX) amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 232 (Roll no. 483).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gooden (TX) amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 232 (Roll no. 483).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
